through so you start by well first you start by gathering data and then you ingest the
data into a pipeline and you try to understand it so you do things like validating it
checking the schema and so forth looking for anomalies looking for issues trying
to do cleanup and so forth then you're going to do some transformation of the data to try to make it easier for the
model to learn from it which is called feature engineering and then you're going to train the model
itself and then you're going to evaluate the the performance of the model how well it does on metrics that are
relevant to the problem that you're trying to solve and then if it actually does better than what you
already have and remember it might not you're going to push it into your
serving infrastructure so to do that in a tfx system
